roleset.name: update, improve
roleset.note: REWORK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rework' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from rework.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: purpose should be arg?
example.text: We know Verdi's own contribution was mighty impressive since [the operatic ``Libera me'']-1 was reworked *trace*-1 for the Manzoni Requiem, of which he wrote every note himself having learned his lesson.
example.arg: for the Manzoni Requiem, of which he wrote every note himself having learned his lesson
